description:
Hajime Aono was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. One day in school, he meets Ritsuko Akine, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.

This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.
synonyms: ออเคสตราบรรเลงฝัน

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Classical Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of classical, not to be applied to anime that use classical in its soundtrack.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

title.native: 青のオーケストラ 5分で楽しいクラシック
青のオーケストラ 第2期

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.

[Profile](https://www.jno.co.jp/ja/member/6) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HigashiRyota_Vl) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eastviolin/)

Ryouta Higashi is the youngest core member of the Japan National Orchestra led by pianist Kyohei Sorita.
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

**[Website](https://novelbright.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Lead0408) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Novelbright_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/novelbright_jp/)**

Five-member Japanese rock band formed in 2013 and mainly active in Osaka.

**[TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@MS4wLjABAAAAtXampH7X5RB5Ln_rZnPjj_uZgB2YIMYy1tMhPYeanqI) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@yudai_vo) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yudai_vo) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yudai_vo/) **

Vocalist for the Japanese rock band *[Novelbright](https://anilist.co/staff/270181)*. Takenaka founded the band in 2013 and is the only remaining original member. He is also known for his accomplishments as a whistler.
